verses.verse: And when Abram <WH87> was ninety <WH8673> <WH8141> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and nine <WH8672>, the YY <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> <WH8735> to Abram <WH87>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, I am 'El SHaddai <WH7706> 'Elohim <WH410>; walk <WH1980> <WH8690> before me <WH6440>, and be thou perfect <WH8549>.
And I will make <WH5414> <WH8799> my covenant <WH1285> between me and thee, and will multiply <WH7235> <WH8686> thee exceedingly <WH3966> <WH3966>.
And Abram <WH87> fell <WH5307> <WH8799> on his face <WH6440>: and 'Elohim <WH430> talked <WH1696> <WH8762> with him, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
As for me <WH589>, behold, my covenant <WH1285> is with thee, and thou shalt be a father <WH1> of many <WH1995> nations <WH1471>.

Neither shall thy name <WH8034> any more be called <WH7121> <WH8735> Abram <WH87>, but thy name <WH8034> shall be Avraham <WH85>; for a father <WH1> of many <WH1995> nations <WH1471> have I made thee <WH5414> <WH8804>.

And I will make <WH6509> thee exceeding <WH3966> <WH3966> fruitful <WH6509> <WH8689>, and I will make <WH5414> <WH8804> nations <WH1471> of thee, and kings <WH4428> shall come out <WH3318> <WH8799> of thee.

And I will establish <WH6965> <WH8689> my covenant <WH1285> between me and thee and thy seed <WH2233> after thee <WH310> in their generations <WH1755> for an everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285>, to be a 'Elohim <WH430> unto thee, and to thy seed <WH2233> after thee <WH310>.

And I will give <WH5414> <WH8804> unto thee, and to thy seed <WH2233> after thee <WH310>, the land <WH776> wherein thou art a stranger <WH4033>, all the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>, for an everlasting <WH5769> possession <WH272>; and I will be their 'Elohim <WH430>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Avraham <WH85>, Thou shalt keep <WH8104> <WH8799> my covenant <WH1285> therefore, thou, and thy seed <WH2233> after thee <WH310> in their generations <WH1755>.

This is my covenant <WH1285>, which ye shall keep <WH8104> <WH8799>, between me and you and thy seed <WH2233> after thee <WH310>; Havahry man child <WH2145> among you shall be circumcised <WH4135> <WH8736>.
And ye shall circumcise <WH5243> <WH8804> the flesh <WH1320> of your foreskin <WH6190>; and it shall be a token <WH226> of the covenant <WH1285> betwixt me and you.

And he that is eight <WH8083> days <WH3117> old <WH1121> shall be circumcised <WH4135> <WH8735> among you, every man child <WH2145> in your generations <WH1755>, he that is born <WH3211> in the house <WH1004>, or bought <WH4736> with money <WH3701> of any stranger <WH1121> <WH5236>, which is not of thy seed <WH2233>.

He that is born <WH3211> in thy house <WH1004>, and he that is bought <WH4736> with thy money <WH3701>, must needs <WH4135> <WH8736> be circumcised <WH4135> <WH8735>: and my covenant <WH1285> shall be in your flesh <WH1320> for an everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285>.

And the uncircumcised <WH6189> man child <WH2145> whose <WH834> flesh <WH1320> of his foreskin <WH6190> is not circumcised <WH4135> <WH8735>, that soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> <WH8738> from his people <WH5971>; he hath broken <WH6565> <WH8689> my covenant <WH1285>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Avraham <WH85>, As for Sarai <WH8297> thy wife <WH802>, thou shalt not call <WH7121> <WH8799> her name <WH8034> Sarai <WH8297>, but <WH3588> Sarah <WH8283> shall her name <WH8034> be.

And I will bless <WH1288> <WH8765> her, and give <WH5414> <WH8804> thee a son <WH1121> also of her: yea, I will bless <WH1288> <WH8765> her, and she shall be a mother of nations <WH1471>; kings <WH4428> of people <WH5971> shall be of her.

Then Avraham <WH85> fell <WH5307> <WH8799> upon his face <WH6440>, and laughed <WH6711> <WH8799>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> in his heart <WH3820>, Shall a child be born <WH3205> <WH8735> unto him that is an hundred <WH3967> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>? and shall Sarah <WH8283>, that is ninety <WH8673> years <WH8141> old <WH1323>, bear <WH3205> <WH8799> ?
And Avraham <WH85> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto 'Elohim <WH430>, O that <WH3863> Yishma`el <WH3458> might live <WH2421> <WH8799> before thee <WH6440> !

And 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Sarah <WH8283> thy wife <WH802> shall bear <WH3205> <WH8802> thee a son <WH1121> indeed <WH61>; and thou shalt call <WH7121> <WH8804> his name <WH8034> Yitz'chak <WH3327>: and I will establish <WH6965> <WH8689> my covenant <WH1285> with him for an everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285>, and with his seed <WH2233> after him <WH310>.

And as for Yishma`el <WH3458>, I have heard thee <WH8085> <WH8804>: Behold, I have blessed <WH1288> <WH8765> him, and will make him fruitful <WH6509> <WH8689>, and will multiply <WH7235> <WH8689> him exceedingly <WH3966> <WH3966>; twelve <WH6240> <WH8147> princes <WH5387> shall he beget <WH3205> <WH8686>, and I will make him <WH5414> <WH8804> a great <WH1419> nation <WH1471>.

But my covenant <WH1285> will I establish <WH6965> <WH8686> with Yitz'chak <WH3327>, which Sarah <WH8283> shall bear <WH3205> <WH8799> unto thee at this set time <WH4150> in the next <WH312> year <WH8141>.
And he left off <WH3615> <WH8762> talking <WH1696> <WH8763> with him, and 'Elohim <WH430> went up <WH5927> <WH8799> from Avraham <WH85>.

And Avraham <WH85> took <WH3947> <WH8799> Yishma`el <WH3458> his son <WH1121>, and all that were born <WH3211> in his house <WH1004>, and all that were bought <WH4736> with his money <WH3701>, every male <WH2145> among the men <WH582> of Avraham's <WH85> house <WH1004>; and circumcised <WH4135> <WH8799> the flesh <WH1320> of their foreskin <WH6190> in the selfsame <WH6106> day <WH3117>, as 'Elohim <WH430> had said <WH1696> <WH8765> unto him.
And Avraham <WH85> was ninety <WH8673> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and nine <WH8672>, when he was circumcised <WH4135> <WH8736> in the flesh <WH1320> of his foreskin <WH6190>.
And Yishma`el <WH3458> his son <WH1121> was thirteen <WH6240> <WH7969> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>, when he was circumcised <WH4135> <WH8736> in the flesh <WH1320> of his foreskin <WH6190>.
In the selfsame <WH6106> day <WH3117> was Avraham <WH85> circumcised <WH4135> <WH8738>, and Yishma`el <WH3458> his son <WH1121>.

And all the men <WH582> of his house <WH1004>, born <WH3211> in the house <WH1004>, and bought <WH4736> with money <WH3701> of the stranger <WH1121> <WH5236>, were circumcised <WH4135> <WH8738> with him.
